card.data.ice_dash.name: Ice Dash
card.data.ice_dash.actions.basic:
Move<sprite name="card_icon_move"><style="value">2</style>.
Move cost of <style="value">Swamps</style> is reduced to <style="value">1</style>
card.data.ice_dash.actions.advanced: Move<sprite name="card_icon_move"><style="value">4</style>. You can travel through <style="value">Lakes</style>. Move cost of <style="value">Lakes</style> and <style="value">Swamps</style> is reduced to <style="value">1</style>
